title: 'Jungle Raj' episode of 'Maharani 2' brings 1999 murder case back to life
selftext: Horrific crime committed by brother of Lalu yadav, Sadhu yadav. Still Shilpi Jain hasn't gotten justice. Neither has Gautam Singh. Multiple criminals with Sadhu yadav raped her and killed both of them.
